info.title: Time Sync Plugin
info.description: The Time Sync plugin provides time synchronisation functionality from various time sources (e.g. NTP).

deferred.description: Determines if automatic time sync shall be initially disabled

periodicity.description: Periodicity of time synchronisation (in hours), 0 for one-off synchronisation

retries.description: Number of synchronisation attempts if the source cannot be reached (may be 0)

interval.description: Time to wait (in miliseconds) before retrying a synchronisation attempt after a failure
